mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BoardNews_tbl SELECT IFNULL(max(bNews_id)+1,100001), #{bnGroup}, #{bnHighLight}, #{bnTitle}, #{bnSubTitle}, #{bnRelatedLink}, #{bnContent}, #{bnViewCount}, #{bnOrder}, #{bnStatus}, #{staff_id}, NOW(), NOW(), null FROM BoardNews_tbl
mapper.select: select *, date_format(bnInsertDt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fmbnInsertDt from BoardNews_tbl where bNews_id = #{bNews_id}
mapper.update: update BoardNews_tbl set bnViewCount = iFnull(bnViewCount, 0) +1 where bNews_id = #{bNews_id}

update BoardNews_tbl set bnGroup= #{bnGroup}, bnHighLight= #{bnHighLight}, bnTitle= #{bnTitle}, bnSubTitle= #{bnSubTitle}, bnRelatedLink= #{bnRelatedLink}, bnContent= #{bnContent}, bnViewCount= #{bnViewCount}, bnOrder= #{bnOrder}, bnStatus= #{bnStatus}, staff_id= #{staff_id}, bnInsertDt= #{bnInsertDt}, bnUpdateDt= NOW(), bnDeleteDt=null where bNews_id = #{bNews_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from BoardNews_tbl WHERE bnDeleteDt IS NULL
SELECT bNews_id, bnTitle, date_format(bnUpdateDt,'%Y-%m-%d') as bnUpdateDt FROM BoardNews_tbl WHERE bnDeleteDt IS NULL ORDER BY bnUpdateDt DESC Limit 5

select c.*, date_format(bnUpdateDt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fmbnUpdateDt from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, a.* from (select * from BoardNews_tbl where bnDeleteDt IS NULL order by bnUpdateDt desc) a, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) c where c.ROWNUM >= #{startRow} and c.ROWNUM <= #{endRow}
mapper.update: update BoardNews_tbl set bnDeleteDt = NOW() where bNews_id = #{bNews_id}
